name: Dicebox Defenders
description:
You roll a the die and it turns into your tower of almost choice. Defeat the enemy dice with your stationery towers. Collect coins to roll for additional towers galore!

To start, simply click on where you want to roll the dice. You start off with 3. Once you have enough money, you can choose to spend it on a re-roll, or a new die!

There's two types of towers, a turret, and a missile launcher! Boom!

  • The turret fires single target projectiles at the nearest enemy die, and if it hits, the enemy die loses one pip of health. If the pip value was 1, the enemy die is defeated.
  • The missile launcher shoots explosive projectiles! Exciting! This tower aims at the nearest enemy and launches a projectile. The projectile explodes upon impact, dealing 2 pips of damage to the nearest enemy dice, and scattering the dice that survive. Be careful though, whatever those dice land on will be their new health!

Here's what you can spend your hard earned coins on:

  • To re-roll, click on the re-roll button on the top right. You can only re-roll 3 towers at a time. Once you have re-roll selected, click on the 3 towers you want to re-roll, or press "ESC" to cancel. You can re-roll your 3 dice by clicking where you want to place them.
  • To roll a new die, click on the roll button, and select where you want to roll your die.  

There is also a reset button on the bottom left if you ever need it. Once you win, you can easily start again! You might roll a lucky pen or two :)
